scenes.description: Omaru Polka and Tsunomaki Watame conclude their performance of 'Gamble Rumble'.
Omaru Polka and Tokoyami Towa begin their performance of 'ez do dance'.

subtitles.original: 暴挙、自分だし、視線を削って過ごしていた

subtitles.original: 代償に手に入れたのは古臭いモラル
subtitles.english: What I got in exchange was an old-fashioned moral

subtitles.original: 臆病なこの群れから今バスタ
subtitles.english: Leaving this cowardly herd now

subtitles.english: Let's jump out with nothing

subtitles.original: 一瞬の選択で すべてを失くしても
subtitles.english: Even if I lose everything in a moment's choice

subtitles.original: 後悔は見せないで 明るく負けて泣きましょう

subtitles.original: 作詞/作曲 小室哲哉
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Tetsuya Komuro

subtitles.original: I can hear my voice 今 始まる
subtitles.english: I can hear my voice, it's starting now

subtitles.original: Midnight time から この場所で
subtitles.english: From midnight time, at this place

subtitles.original: 行くあてが同じ仲間と すべての嘘脱ぎ去る
subtitles.english: With friends heading to the same destination, taking off all lies

subtitles.original: 何もなくて道もなくて 踊る君はどこから
subtitles.english: With nothing and no road, where are you dancing from?

subtitles.original: 逃げているのさ 行くのさ 不思議なほどまぶしい
subtitles.english: Running away, going, it's mysteriously bright

subtitles.original: 誘う夢 語り合って 絆なめ合ってるだけだし
subtitles.english: Talking about the inviting dreams, just licking each other's bonds

subtitles.original: Easy go easy go 笑顔だけ ひとときの輪をつなぐよ
subtitles.english: Easy go easy go, only smiles connect the wheel for a moment
